pages.text: Glimmers are created through a ritual, where various types of $(l:creation/dusts)eligible dusts$() are converted into power. Dusts are provided through $(l:blocks/functional_andesite)andesite bowls$(), and the ritual is begun by right-clicking the $(l:blocks/functional_andesite#ritual_rune)ritual rune$() with a $(l:creation/implements)ritual knife$().$(br2)The structure for this ritual consists of various $(l:blocks/functional_andesite)functional$() and $(l:blocks/decorative_andesite)decorative$() blocks.
$(warning) The number of glimmers created is relative to the power of the ritual.
